entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' in conversation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is teaching Divination, mentioned by Dumbledore as having made a prophecy about Harry and Voldemort.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: A centaur who is teaching Divination in place of Professor Trelawney, mentioned by Dumbledore as being an outcast in the Forest.

entities.name: sybill trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney's first name, mentioned by Dumbledore as not knowing about the danger she would be in outside the castle.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned by Dumbledore as being the subject of a prophecy made by Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned in conversation with Harry about his staff problems and the task he set for Harry.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney made a prophecy about Harry and Voldemort, mentioned by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore is Firenze's employer, as he is teaching Divination at Hogwarts in place of Professor Trelawney.
Dumbledore is Sybill Trelawney's employer, as she is a teacher at Hogwarts.
